Name: HMS Dasher
Renamed: built as Rio de Janeiro, renamed Dasher 2 July 1942
Armament:
3 × 4 inch DP, AA guns in single mounts
15 × 20 mm anti-aircraft cannons in single or twin mounts
Aviation facilities:
Hangar 190 ft (58 m) x 47 ft (14 m)
one 42 feet (13 m) x 34 feet (10 m) lifts
9 arrestor wires
